name: Team Oceans (SporkTank)
description:
Enjoy my entry for Godot Wild Jam #41! The theme was OCEAN.

Controls:

  • wasd = move camera
  • left mouse click / drag = interact
  • mouse wheel = zoom / pan camera
  • right mouse click = exit drone
  • alt + enter = toggle fullscreen
  • escape = pause

Credits:

  • font: fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Sans (OFL)
  • music + sound effects: zapsplat.com
  • water shader: godotshaders.com/shader/wind-waker-2d-water-shader-canvas_item
  • crt shader: godotshaders.com/shader/vhs-and-crt-monitor-effect
  • rope physics inspiration: youtube.com/watch?v=Dh9KotU2m1o (@MV_Raffa)
  • testers: llxu, jig

Inspiration:

  • https://teamseas.org/
  • https://theoceancleanup.com/
